p: A significant decrease in time domain parameters was shown in Group C when compared to Groups N, B1 and B2. These parameters included the SD of all normal intervals (SDNN) (P < 0.05), the root‐mean square of successive differences between normal heartbeats (rMSSD) (P < 0.01), and the percentage of adjacent normal intervals that differ from each other by more than 50 ms (pNN50) (P < 0.01).
